title.rendered: When you hire a Driver in Delhi NCR, do you verify his background?

content.rendered:
To hire a Driver is one thing. And to verify his background is the other.

How often do you do both?

Try Background Verification services of Helpers Near Me and verify your Driver today.

HELPERS NEAR ME (HNM) helps you find & hire legally verified workers near you. The platform uses technology and a lot of groundwork to help you connect directly with workers without any middlemen or commissions. On the other end, HNM helps the underprivileged workers of India find local employment, free of cost, directly from nearby employers like yourself. From time to time, HNM also engages with Government bodies and NGOs to spread the platform’s accessibility to as many workers all over India as possible. 

Did you hire a Driver in Delhi NCR? Did you verify his credentials?

Research indicates that less than 20% of people get the credentials verified of their Drivers and other Workers who work at their homes or workplaces.

The study also indicates that about 95% of people who work as Workers are a genuine bunch of people trying to earn a respectful living.

But to find the balance of 5%, who stains the entire Workers Community, one has to get every individual verified.

Whether a new Employee in an MNC, a new Tenant or when you hire a Driver or any other Worker, verifying the credentials is a norm, which only about 20% of us follow.

So, where do you belong when you hire a driver – 80% who never get their Drivers’ credentials verified or the rest?

Even though our Government is making every effort to ask every one of us to “verify before you hire a driver or any other worker”, most of us often ignore it.

We just keep a copy of their IDs, and that’s it.

Sometimes, we take the pains of going to the nearest police station for verification. But the actual percentage of us taking this extra pain is less.

A major portion of the people who hire Drivers, Maids or any other Helpers ignores the whole “background verification” process.

Well, if you are willing to take that extra mile, here’s a new initiative that makes verifying the credentials very simple when you hire a Driver, Maid or any other Helper who works at your place or office.

Here’s a new initiative from Helpers Near Me.

It is an online Background Verification Service.

This service lets you verify your Maid, Driver or any other Helper online and in the most convenient way possible.

Imagine getting a detailed Background Verification Report of your Maid or Driver working at your home.

Here are 3 quick steps you need to take when you need your Maid’s Background Verification Report.

And all of it can be done directly through our mobile phones.

Step 1:

Visit the Background Verification page of Helpers Near Me.

Step 2:

Fill in your Driver’s necessary details if you have them (Name, Phone, ID number & Address, if you have).

Or you can choose to fill in your details only (again, just your Name, Phone & Email)

Step 3:

Make a secure payment through your Paytm Account or Credit/Debit Card.

That is all. You must follow the above-mentioned basic steps to initiate your Verification request.

Post your request, and the Helpers Near Me team will contact you for any further details if required.

Or, if all the details are intact, you may get your Driver’s Background Verification Report in 10-15 working days maximum.

You don’t even need to go anywhere to pick up the report.

So when you hire a driver, you get his detailed Background Verification report directly in your email inbox.

Helpers Near Me follows a 2/3 step verification process.

1) ID Check, which confirms the validity of the govt. ID the person carries 

2) Court/Criminal Records Check, which scans the Court Records of the individual at the neighbouring Indian District Courts around his/her address, & 

3) Address Check, which reports whether the person stays at the place where one claims to be staying.

Our associate company’s integration with UIDAI, NSDL, and reliable Government District portals ensures a diligent Background Verification of every individual’s credential that goes through the process.

With this kind of Professional Background Verification Check, you get transparency into Driver’s Identity, Antecedents, and Character.

This kind of Professional Verification Check allows you to take an informed decision on the person you have already hired or are about to hire.

To conclude, when you hire a Driver, with this new Background Verification initiative of Helpers Near Me, you have an option to be 100% sure of his credentials.

If you are still relying on your Driver’s ID copy and some references, we suggest you verify your Driver, Maid, Nanny, or other Helpers today!

Legally Verify the credentials of your Maid, Driver, Security Guards, Babysitters, Cooks, Gardener or any other workers. Try the Professional Verification Services of Helpers Near Me.

Want to get quick answers to some of your questions? Read our FAQs section.

We recommend hiring workers from Helpers Near Me. Here’s why:

Helpers Near Me uses technology and a lot of groundwork to help you connect directly with workers without any middlemen or commissions.

On one end, HNM helps the underprivileged workers of India find local employment, free of cost, directly from nearby employers like yourself. On the other, the digital infrastructure built around HNM makes it easy, quick, reliable & affordable for anyone to find & hire 100+ profiles of nearby workers.

With a vision to end poverty, forced labour, worker exploitation, and human trafficking, HNM is working towards building an unbiased and inclusive digital ecosystem where the underprivileged workforce of India can join the platform easily and access local employment free of cost, with or without smartphones.

HNM believes having enough local employment opportunities allows the workers to find a better working environment, better salaries and a chance to improve their and their families’ quality of life.

From time to time, HNM also engages with Government bodies and NGOs to make the platform accessible to as many workers in India as possible.

Find how many Workers have joined the movement to connect with YOU directly.

Many of the workers have also received local employment opportunities.
